task_descriptions: Reserve flight with id `id-1@plane`. Your name is `CustomerName@plane`.
completion_questions: Did the AI Assistant book your flight?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?
linear_guide: Read the instructions on the left. In this dialogue, either act like a very annoying/grumpy person, or like a wise/serene person who'se constantly talking in profound-sounding riddles.
Once you've booked the flight `id-2@plane` (or learned that booking is not possible), you can end the conversation. You can also keep writing for a bit, if you like :)

Wizard.task_description: Help the user book their flight.
